results.text: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
results.reflection: With God's strength, Trevor can overcome any obstacle.

results.text: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
results.reflection: God has a purpose and hope-filled future for Trevor.

results.text: Delight yourself in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
results.reflection: As Trevor delights in the Lord, his desires align with God's purpose.

results.text: Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: God's presence and support in times of fear.
results.reflection: Even in moments of fear, Trevor can find strength in God's presence.

results.text: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
results.reason: Encouragement to surrender worries to God.
results.reflection: Trevor can find peace by entrusting his concerns to a caring God.
